titleStmt.title: A fresh relation from the Kings army in Scotland the retreat of the rebels on their approach, with the names of such persons of quality as have lately joyn'd the rebellious troops : being the tidings brought by the last express in a pacquet dated the 20th of this instant June 1679 just at midnight.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
